definition: (Colonel Muammar) Gaddafi (1942-2011), de facto leader of Libya from 1969-2011
to block/to be stuck/to be wedged/customs station/a clip/a fastener/a checkpost/Taiwan pr. [ka3]
to stop/to block/(computing) (coll.) slow/(loanword) card/CL:張|张[zhang1],片[pian4]/truck (from "car")/calorie (abbr. for 卡路里[ka3 lu4 li3])/cassette
penetrating (as of cold)/struggle
to prick/to run or stick (a needle etc) into/jug (a classifier for liquids such as beer)
abbr. for the Philippines 菲律賓|菲律宾[Fei1 lu:4 bin1]
luxuriant (plant growth)/rich with fragrance/phenanthrene C14H10
poor/humble/unworthy/radish (old)

sentences.english: Muammar al-Qaddafi, making his first appearance despite 40 years in power.
sentences.chinese: 這也是卡扎菲執政40年來首次參加聯大會議。

sentences.english: Everybody knows that qadaffi was working with the US to route out terror suspects.
sentences.chinese: 大家都知道，卡扎菲和美國合作抓捕恐怖嫌疑人。

sentences.english: His reputation may even have been enhanced among opponents of Washington's heavy-handed foreign policy.
sentences.chinese: 卡扎菲甚至在反對華盛頓鐵腕政策中的人中名聲鵲起。

sentences.english: It is the clearest possible directive to Gaddafi and his cohorts to end the killing.
sentences.chinese: 這是要求卡扎菲和同夥結束殺戮最爲明確的一項指令。

sentences.english: As oil prices skyrocketed, Gaddafi and his family suddenly had more money than they knew what to do with.
sentences.chinese: 得利於油價的飆升，卡扎菲家族身價倍增。

sentences.english: In 1969, Gadhafi overthrew the Eastern tribal King Idris.
sentences.chinese: 1969年，卡扎菲推翻了東部的部落酋長伊德里斯。

sentences.english: It was that attack that finally sowed the seeds for Gaddafi's demise.
sentences.chinese: 正是這次報復事件爲卡扎菲埋下了滅亡的種子。

sentences.english: Col Muammar Gaddafi has offered a universal promotion for everyone serving in the army and police.
sentences.chinese: 卡扎菲已提出在軍隊和警察服務大家普遍推廣。

sentences.english: Ghaddafi spoke highly of China's independent foreign policy of peace, saying that China is a great nation in its development.
sentences.chinese: 卡扎菲高度評價中國奉行的和平外交政策。

sentences.english: In the photo, Al-qaddafi's face is covered with blood, look trance.
sentences.chinese: 照片中，卡扎菲血流滿面，神色恍惚。

sentences.english: Whenever Gaddafi visited Italy, he was paraded as a guest of honor.
sentences.chinese: 每當卡扎菲訪問意大利，他被遊街當作榮譽嘉賓。

sentences.english: He said, Al-qaddafi was arrested after death.
sentences.chinese: 他表示，卡扎菲在被逮捕後死亡。

sentences.english: The spouses of Khadafi's children and their children arrived as well.
sentences.chinese: 卡扎菲子女的配偶和孩子也到達了那裏。

sentences.english: But Senator McCain is looking ahead to a post-Gadhafi Libya.
sentences.chinese: 但是麥凱恩參議員卻在展望後卡扎菲時代的利比亞。

sentences.english: A military commander says former rebels have him cornered.
sentences.chinese: 一位軍事指揮說卡扎菲被前反叛軍監禁。

sentences.english: Rebels have been trying to fight off a counter-offensive by Gaddafi forces.
sentences.chinese: 反政府武裝一直試圖擊退由卡扎菲部隊反攻。

Anwar Al Sadat

Nicolas Sarkozy (1955-), French UMP politician, President 2007-2012
Erdogan (name)/Recep Tayyip Erdoğan (1954-), Turkish politician, prime minister from 2003
